metadata.title: CVE-2024-38372 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: Undici is an HTTP/1.1 client, written from scratch for Node.js. Dependingon network and process conditions of a `fetch()` request,`response.arrayBuffer()` might include portion of memory from the Node.jsprocess. This has been patched in v6.19.2.

criterions.comment: node-undici package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
node-undici package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
